game.name: Adventure of Curious Knight
game.description:
You would not like to miss out an adventure that is full of thrill and fun. Here we have tried our best to get you on board the platform where you can keep you busy for long. Do you want to try it out once? Join Adventure of Curious Knight right away to treat you with the best adventurous journey you have ever taken! Your objective in this brand new platform game is to go with this curious knight and enjoy the most waited adventurous. 

Do not forget to collect coins and diamonds to improve your points in this free online adventure game! You will have 4 levels to play and complete online for free. There is no need to get puzzled. Think twice to make a jump from one platform to another one! Try to take extra precautions to make a precise jump! Avoid feeling low in case of being falling down and get ready to start your game again with full energy and power! Give your helping hands to knight to go through all levels of html5 adventure platformer!

Avoid all the obstacles you see in your way and concentrate on grabbing all kinds of treasure like rubies and coins! Practice your fingers hard on the keyboard or mobile phone to go as far as possible in this super fun-filled platform game! We have countess time-based adventure games for kids online on atmegame.com. All the best to clear its all levels and see yourself wearing the crown of the virtual adventure world!
